noun.description: The action or fact of talking rapidly and continuously in a foolish, excited, or incomprehensible way.
examples: the constant babbling of the kids

noun.description: The continuous murmuring sound of flowing water.
examples: the babbling of a nearby river

adjective.description: Talking rapidly and continuously in a foolish, excited, or incomprehensible way.
examples: you sound like a babbling fool

adjective.description: (of flowing water) making a continuous murmuring sound.
